messages.createSlideError: The slide could not be saved.

actions.createSlideNoLanguageChange: New Slide can only be created in our chosen system default language

labelInput.title: Slide Label
labelInput.placeholder: Enter a Name for your Slide
labelInput.helpText: Set a name for the slide. This name will only be used to identify the slide

element.label: HTML Element
element.helpText: Lege ein HTML Element für deine Überschrift fest. Ist kein Element ausgewählt wird ein div Element verwendet

container.title: Content Container
container.description: Here you can influence the behavior of the content container. For more information, see our documentation.

boxMode.title: Content Box Width Limit
boxMode.helpText: If you enable width limit, the content container is automatically limited to a maximum width of 50%. You can further specify the maximum width in the settings. With width limit enabled, you can also align the content container horizontally. Since the content container is displayed on full width when the with limit is disabled, the horizontal alignment has no effect.

horizontalAlign.title: Horizontal Alignment
horizontalAlign.helpText: Set the Horizontal Alignment of the Container Element. This Option just applies on Boxed Mode

customFields.onCreateMessage: Please save the slide first. After that you can maintain the custom fields.
customFields.emptyFieldSet: You have not yet created any custom fields for the Elysium Slides. Go to the custom fields settings and create a set for the Elysium Slides.
